name: tool_process_pdf_link
description:
SUMMARY: Extracts raw text content from a remote PDF file URL without using OCR.

LOGIC (ЛОГИКА РАБОТЫ):
1. Validates that the provided URL points to a downloadable resource.
2. Connects to the external MCP/API to stream the file.
3. Extracts text from the document layer (images and rasterized text are ignored).
4. Returns the raw text string.

RETURN VALUE (ВОЗВРАЩАЕМОЕ ЗНАЧЕНИЕ):
Returns a JSON object: { "status": "success" | "error", "content": "string (the extracted text)", "metadata": { "page_count": integer }, "error_detail": "string (optional)" }.

ERRORS (ВОЗМОЖНЫЕ ОШИБКИ):
- "DOWNLOAD_FAILED": Network issue or 404.
- "PROTECTED_FILE": PDF is password locked.
- "PARSING_ERROR": File is corrupt or contains no selectable text (scan-only PDF).

url.description: The direct URL to the PDF file to be processed.
